caption: This image captures a dramatic silhouette scene featuring two individuals and a Coca-Cola bottle. The photograph's lighting creates a stark contrast, emphasizing the dark outlines of the figures and the bottle against a richly colored backdrop. The background transitions from warm orange at the bottom to a darker hue at the top, which may suggest a setting sun or dim indoor lighting. To the right of the image, one silhouette appears to be holding the neck of the Coca-Cola bottle, positioned near the center of the composition. The focus on the Coca-Cola bottle, emphasized by its clearer and more lightened silhouette, seems to be a central point of interaction or activity among the figures. The overall mood is intimate and subdued, with an element of mystery introduced by the dark silhouettes and minimal visible details.
title: Recycled beer bottles receive final inspection.  Columbine glass company
